chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: Set
e: dio_single nat P

Goal:
{m : nat & {p' : dio_polynomial (pos m) P & {q' : dio_polynomial (pos m) P | forall ν : P -> nat, dio_single_pred e ν <-> dio_single_pred (p', q') ν}}}

Premises:
dio_single_pred : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P * dio_polynomial V P -> (P -> nat) -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation pos := Fin.t
dio_single = fun V P : Set => (dio_polynomial V P * dio_polynomial V P)%type : Set -> Set -> Set Arguments dio_single (_ _)%type_scope
Inductive dio_polynomial (V P : Set) : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P Arguments dio_polynomial (_ _)%type_scope Arguments dp_nat {V P}%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments dp_var {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_par {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_comp {V P}%type_scope
dio_poly_pos : forall (m : nat) p, (forall x : nat, In x (dp_var_list p) -> x < m) -> {q : dio_polynomial (pos m) P | forall (φ : nat -> nat) (ν : P -> nat), dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval (vec_pos (fun2vec 0 m φ)) ν q}
dio_rel_single : forall R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop, 𝔻R R -> {E : dio_single nat nat | forall ν : nat -> nat, R ν < -> dio_single_pred E ν}
ssrfun.tagged2 : forall w : {x : ?I & ?T_ x & ?U_ x}, ?T_ (ssrfun.tag2 w) where ?I : [P : Set e : dio_single nat P |- Type] ?T_ : [P : Set e : dio_single nat P |- ?I -> Type] ?U_ : [P : Set e : dio_single nat P |- ?I -> Type]
ssrfun.tagged2' : forall w : {x : ?I & ?T_ x & ?U_ x}, ?U_ (ssrfun.tag2 w) where ?I : [P : Set e : dio_single nat P |- Type] ?T_ : [P : Set e : dio_single nat P |- ?I -> Type] ?U_ : [P : Set e : dio_single nat P |- ?I -> Type]
ssrfun.Tagged : forall T_ : ?I -> Type, T_ ?i -> {x0 : ?I & T_ x0} where ?I : [P : Set e : dio_single nat P |- Type] ?i : [P : Set e : dio_single nat P |- ?I]
dio_elem_equation : forall l : list dio_constraint, {E : dio_single nat nat | dio_single_size E <= 2 + 20 * length l /\ (forall ν : nat -> nat, dio_single_pred E ν <-> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l))}
Inductive dio_polynomial (V P : Set) : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P Arguments dio_polynomial (_ _)%type_scope Arguments dp_nat {V P}%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments dp_var {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_par {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_comp {V P}%type_scope
dp_eval_fix_mul : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_mul p q) = dp_eval φ ν p * dp_eval φ ν q
dp_eval_fix_add : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_add p q) = dp_eval φ ν p + dp_eval φ ν q
dp_size : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> nat
utils_nat.bounded_search : forall (m : nat) (P : nat -> Type), (forall n : nat, n < m -> P n + (P n -> False)) -> {n : nat & ((n < m) * P n)%type} + {forall n : nat, n < m -> P n -> False}
dp_par_list : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> list P
dp_eval : forall V P : Set, (V -> nat) -> (P -> nat) -> dio_polynomial V P -> nat
dp_var_list : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> list V
dio_single_size : forall V P : Set, dio_single V P -> nat
dp_eval_ext : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (φ' : V -> nat) (ν' : P -> nat) (p : dio_polynomial V P), (forall v : V, In v (dp_var_list p) -> φ v = φ' v) -> (forall i : P, In i (dp_par_list p) -> ν i = ν' i) -> dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval φ' ν' p
dio_polynomial_rec : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Set), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_ind : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_sind : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_rect : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Type), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
ZifyClasses.rew_iff : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> P -> Q
dio_elem_single : forall l : list dio_constraint, {E : dio_single nat nat | dio_single_size E <= 2 + 20 * length l /\ (forall ν φ : nat -> nat, dp_eval φ ν (fst E) = dp_eval φ ν (snd E) <-> Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l)}
Forall_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (x : X) (ll : list X), Forall P (x :: ll) < -> P x /\ Forall P ll
dio_rel = fun R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop => {f : dio_formula | forall ν : nat -> nat, df_pred f ν < -> R ν} : ((nat -> nat) -> Prop) -> Set Arguments dio_rel _%function_scope
Fin.t_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, pos n -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (S n) pos0) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : pos n), P n t -> P (S n) (pos_nxt t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : pos n), P n t
pos_list : forall n : nat, list (pos n)
Forall_forall_map : forall (X : Type) (f : nat -> X) (n : nat) (l : list X) (P : X -> Prop), l = map f (list_an 0 n) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> P (f i)) < -> Forall P l
dio_repr_at_eq : forall x y a : nat, dio_repr_at (fun ν : nat -> nat => ν x = ν y) a 6 5
vec_set_pos : forall (X : Type) (n : nat), (pos n -> X) -> vec X n
VectorDef.t_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Set), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t
pos_S_invert : forall (n : nat) (P : pos (S n) -> Type), P pos0 -> (forall p : pos n, P (pos_nxt p)) -> forall p : pos (S n), P p
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
dp_size_fix_comp : forall (V P : Set) (o : dio_op) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_size (dp_comp o p q) = 1 + dp_size p + dp_size q
dio_repr_at_cst : forall x i a : nat, dio_repr_at (fun ν : nat -> nat => ν x = i) a 6 5
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
pos_not_diag : forall n : nat, list (pos n * pos n)
gcd.bezout_generalized : forall p q : nat, {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ gcd.is_gcd p q g /\ gcd.is_lcm p q l}}}}
gcd.division_by_even : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {j : nat | gcd.arem n d q j}}
gcd.bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ gcd.is_gcd p q g /\ gcd.is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : Forall P nil | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l) Arguments Forall [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Forall_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall_cons [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
